ne8:1.4_0: Ye dhammā ekalakkhaṇā, tesaṁ dhammānaṁ ekasmiṁ dhamme vutte avasiṭṭhā dhammā vuttā bhavanti.
ne8:2.1_2: anavaṭṭhitaṁ ittaraṁ parittaṁ pabhaṅgu parato dukkhaṁ byasanaṁ calanaṁ kukkuḷaṁ saṅkhāraṁ vadhakaṁ amittamajjhe”.
ne8:2.2_0: Imasmiṁ cakkhusmiṁ vutte avasiṭṭhāni ajjhattikāni āyatanāni vuttāni bhavanti.
ne8:2.4_0: Sabbāni hi cha ajjhattikāni āyatanāni vadhakaṭṭhena ekalakkhaṇāni.
ne8:3.1_3: paccuppannassa rūpassa nibbidāya virāgāya nirodhāya cāgāya paṭinissaggāya paṭipajja”.
ne8:3.2_0: Imasmiṁ rūpakkhandhe vutte avasiṭṭhā khandhā vuttā bhavanti.
ne8:3.4_0: Sabbe hi pañcakkhandhā yamakovādasutte vadhakaṭṭhena ekalakkhaṇā vuttā.
ne8:5.1_0: Iti kāyagatāya satiyā vuttāya vuttā bhavanti vedanāgatā sati cittagatā dhammagatā ca.
ne8:5.2_0: Tathā yaṁ kiñci diṭṭhaṁ vā sutaṁ vā mutaṁ vāti vutte vuttaṁ bhavati viññātaṁ.
ne8:6.1_0: “Tasmātiha tvaṁ bhikkhu kāye kāyānupassī viharāhi ātāpī sampajāno satimā vineyya loke abhijjhādomanassaṁ”.
ne8:6.2_4: evaṁ kāye kāyānupassino viharato cattāro satipaṭṭhānā bhāvanāpāripūriṁ gacchanti.
ne8:7.1_0: Catūsu satipaṭṭhānesu bhāviyamānesu cattāro sammappadhānā bhāvanāpāripūriṁ gacchanti,
ne8:7.1_1: catūsu sammappadhānesu bhāviyamānesu cattāro iddhipādā bhāvanāpāripūriṁ gacchanti,
ne8:7.1_2: catūsu iddhipādesu bhāviyamānesu pañcindriyāni bhāvanāpāripūriṁ gacchanti,
ne8:7.1_3: pañcasu indriyesu bhāviyamānesu pañca balāni bhāvanāpāripūriṁ gacchanti,
ne8:7.1_4: pañcasu balesu bhāviyamānesu satta bojjhaṅgā bhāvanāpāripūriṁ gacchanti,
ne8:7.1_5: sattasu bojjhaṅgesu bhāviyamānesu ariyo aṭṭhaṅgiko maggo bhāvanāpāripūriṁ gacchati,
ne8:7.1_6: sabbeva bodhaṅgamā dhammā bodhipakkhiyā bhāvanāpāripūriṁ gacchanti.
ne8:7.2_1: sabbe hi bodhaṅgamā bodhipakkhiyā neyyānikalakkhaṇena ekalakkhaṇā,
ne8:8.1_0: Evaṁ akusalāpi dhammā ekalakkhaṇattā pahānaṁ abbhatthaṁ gacchanti.
ne8:8.2_10: evaṁ akusalāpi dhammā ekalakkhaṇattā pahānaṁ abbhatthaṁ gacchanti.
ne8:9.1_0: Yattha vā pana rūpindriyaṁ desitaṁ, desitā tattheva rūpadhātu rūpakkhandho rūpañcāyatanaṁ.
ne8:9.2_0: Yattha vā pana sukhā vedanā desitā,
ne8:9.2_1: desitaṁ tattha sukhindriyaṁ somanassindriyaṁ dukkhasamudayo ca ariyasaccaṁ.
ne8:9.3_0: Yattha vā pana dukkhā vedanā desitā,
ne8:9.3_1: desitaṁ tattha dukkhindriyaṁ domanassindriyaṁ dukkhañca ariyasaccaṁ.
ne8:9.4_0: Yattha vā pana adukkhamasukhā vedanā desitā,
ne8:9.4_1: desitaṁ tattha upekkhindriyaṁ sabbo ca paṭiccasamuppādo.
ne8:9.5_0: Kena kāraṇena, adukkhamasukhāya hi vedanāya avijjā anuseti.
ne8:9.7_0: So ca sarāgasadosasamohasaṅkilesapakkhena hātabbo, vītarāgavītadosavītamohaariyadhammehi hātabbo.
ne8:10.1_0: Evaṁ ye dhammā ekalakkhaṇā kiccato ca lakkhaṇato ca sāmaññato ca cutūpapātato ca,
ne8:10.1_1: tesaṁ dhammānaṁ ekasmiṁ dhamme vutte avasiṭṭhā dhammā vuttā bhavanti.
